app.title: Case Fund Tracking Analysis System
app.subtitle: Professional Fund Flow Tracking Analysis Tool

home.welcome: Welcome to Fund Tracking Analysis System
home.description: Professional tool for tracking and analyzing fund flows in financial investigations

algorithm_description.fifo: Uses First In First Out principle to track fund flows, accurately calculating the source of each transaction
algorithm_description.balance_method: Based on balance priority principle, personal expenses use personal funds first, shortfalls are counted as misappropriation
algorithm_description.overview: Choose between FIFO and Balance Method algorithms to track fund flows, meeting different professional audit requirements

algorithms.fifo_description: First In First Out tracking method

query.title: Time Point Query
query.query_description: Precisely query fund status at specific time points, including balance distribution, misappropriation details, profit allocation and comprehensive information

fund_pools.title: Fund Pool Information
fund_pools.no_pools_found: No investment product fund pools found at current time point
fund_pools.no_pools_hint: Fund pools usually appear in investment product transactions such as subscriptions/redemptions
fund_pools.no_query_yet: Please execute time point query first to get fund pool information
fund_pools.no_query_hint: Select Excel file and enter row number, then click query button
fund_pools.no_records: This fund pool has no transaction records at current time point.

log_messages.fund_pool_query_success: Fund pool {{pool}} query successful: {{count}} transaction records
log_messages.fund_pool_no_records: Fund pool {{pool}} exists but has no transaction records
log_messages.export_start: Starting export of current time point all fund pool information to Excel
log_messages.export_success: Current time point fund pool information exported to: {{path}}

export.title: Save as Excel File
export.success_message: Current time point fund pool information exported to: {{path}}
export.failed_message: No fund pool data to export

system_environment.title: System Environment Check
system_environment.dev_mode_hint: 💡 Currently running in development mode, environment checks have relaxed requirements
system_environment.click_check_hint: Click "Check Environment" button to verify system runtime environment.
system_environment.check_error_message: System environment has issues that may affect normal operation.
system_environment.check_failed_message: Unable to complete system environment check: {{error}}

system_architecture.title: System Architecture
system_architecture.description: High-performance fund tracking analysis system supporting large-scale data processing and real-time analysis.
system_architecture.processing_capability_desc: Supports rapid analysis of 10,000+ transaction records
system_architecture.analysis_algorithms_desc: Dual-engine support for FIFO algorithm and Balance Method
system_architecture.result_output_desc: Professional Excel format reports with history record management

data_management_details.safe_cleanup_hint: Detected {{count}} files that can be safely deleted, recommend regular cleanup to free storage space.
data_management_details.history_limit_warning: History records are approaching limit, recommend regular cleanup to maintain system performance
data_management_details.query_history_status: • Query history contains {{count}} records, will be retained after software restart
data_management_details.analysis_history_status: • Analysis history contains {{count}} records, including generated Excel analysis report files
data_management_details.auto_management_desc: System will automatically manage historical records based on your set maximum record count (current: {{count}} records). Use "Sync History Records" to cleanup orphaned files and ensure data consistency.
data_management_details.orphan_files_warning: ⚠️ Detected {{count}} orphaned files, recommend using "Sync History Records" function for cleanup
data_management_details.temp_files_status: • Temp directory contains {{totalFiles}} files, of which {{orphanedFiles}} are orphaned files

data_notifications.sync_completed: History sync completed, deleted {{deletedRecords}} records and {{deletedFiles}} files
data_notifications.time_cleanup_completed: Time-based cleanup completed, deleted {{queryDeleted}} query records and {{analysisDeleted}} analysis records

version_info.title: Version Information
version_info.version_message: System version information has been updated

legacy_version_info.dev_version_desc: Development mode version for testing and debugging. Official release version will be packaged as standalone installer.
legacy_version_info.standalone_version_desc: Standalone installer version with built-in Rust high-performance engine, no Python environment needed, one-click installation ready to use.
legacy_version_info.update_method_desc: Update by installing new version installer package
legacy_version_info.technical_advantage_desc: Native Rust implementation, processing speed 3-5x faster than Python version

file.drag_drop: Drag and drop file here or click to select

success.save_completed: Query results saved as JSON file
success.copy_completed: Copied {{count}} lines of log to clipboard
success.analysis_completed: Fund tracking analysis completed, please check results
success.history_reminder_message: Analysis history records have exceeded the set limit, recommend going to settings page for cleanup to maintain system performance.

errors.select_file_and_row: Please select file and enter row number
errors.enter_valid_row: Please enter valid row number (integer greater than 0)
errors.select_excel_first: Please select Excel file to analyze first

info.drag_drop_message: Please drag files directly to the application window, or click browse button to select files
info.no_update_needed: Current version runs independently, no network update needed
info.ui_stopped: UI stopped updating, Python process may still be running in background

errors.python_not_available: Python environment is not available, please check if Python is properly installed

error.page_render_error: An unexpected error occurred during page rendering. This may be a temporary issue, please try refreshing the page.

status.ready_to_analyze: Ready to analyze, click to start
status.query_log_placeholder: 🔍 Time point query logs will be displayed here in real time...
status.analysis_log_placeholder: 🔍 Python analysis logs will be displayed here in real time...

homepage.algorithm_intro: The system supports two core algorithms, you can choose the appropriate analysis method according to audit requirements

offline.description: Fully localized processing to prevent data leakage

professional.description: Professional-grade visual analysis reports with fund pool statistics

settings_labels.auto_save_description: Automatically save query history and analysis results
settings_labels.notifications_description: Show system notifications and operation tips
settings_labels.max_history_help: Maximum number of query history records to keep (10-1000)
settings_labels.auto_update_disabled: Disabled in standalone version (no network required)
settings_labels.update_notifications_disabled: Disabled in standalone version (no network required)
settings_labels.standalone_version_description: Standalone version, no network updates required. All features are fully available.
settings_labels.click_check_env_hint: Click the check environment button to verify Python configuration

time_selection.title: Select Cleanup Time Point
time_selection.description: Select date and time point, the system will display all historical records before that time. You can export Excel analysis files to folders for long-term storage, or directly cleanup records.
time_selection.cleanup_description: Will cleanup all historical records before this time
time_selection.found_records: Found {{queryCount}} query records and {{analysisCount}} analysis records

backup.analysis_results_folder: ├── Analysis Results Files/          # Excel analysis report files
backup.backup_list: ├── Backup List.json         # Detailed backup information and index
backup.note_1: 1. Analysis results files folder contains all Excel analysis reports
backup.note_2: 2. Backup List.json contains complete historical record information for data recovery
backup.note_3: 3. These files are independent of the original app and can be stored long-term
backup.note_4: 4. For data recovery, please contact technical support or check app documentation
backup.original_app_path: Original app path: C:\Users\TUF\Desktop\资金追踪\tauri-app
backup.success_message:
Export location: {{location}}

Statistics:
- Query records: {{queryCount}} items
- Analysis records: {{analysisCount}} items
- Excel files: {{fileCount}} files
backup.export_failed_checks:

1. Folder permissions
2. Disk space
3. Whether original files exist

analysis_history.title: Analysis History
analysis_history.no_records: No analysis history yet. Records will appear here after completing your first analysis.
analysis_history.status_check_completed: Checked {{totalChecked}} records, updated {{totalUpdated}} file status entries
analysis_history.all_files_current: Checked {{totalChecked}} records, all file statuses are up to date
analysis_history.refresh_error: Unable to update file status, please try again later
analysis_history.delete_success_message: Analysis record and all related files have been successfully deleted
analysis_history.partial_delete_message: Some files have been deleted, but some failed to delete: {{errors}}. Record updated to reflect current status.
analysis_history.delete_failed_message: Unable to delete analysis record: {{errors}}. Record has been retained.
analysis_history.delete_error: Unexpected error occurred while deleting record, please try again later
analysis_history.open_main_failed: Unable to open analysis result file, file may not exist or has been moved.
analysis_history.open_pool_failed: Unable to open offsite pool record file, file may not exist or has been moved.
analysis_history.file_operation_error: Error occurred while opening file, please check if file exists.
analysis_history.save_as_failed: Save As operation was cancelled or failed

file_info.no_pool_file: No offsite pool file for this record

tooltips.open_pool_deleted: Offsite pool file deleted, cannot open

delete_dialog.title: Delete Analysis Record
delete_dialog.confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete this analysis record? The system will attempt to delete the following files:
delete_dialog.warning: Note: If some files cannot be deleted (e.g., being used), the record will be retained and show deletion status. This operation cannot be undone.
